hero_title: Compare the best diapers for your little one.
hero_subtitle: Find the best price-per-diaper, absorbent features, and eco-friendly options in seconds.
hero_search_placeholder: Search by brand (Huggies, Pampers) or size...
category_subtitle: Discover the right fit for your baby's needs
trending_subtitle: Best performance & value based on 5k+ parent reviews
buying_guide_title: How to choose the right diaper?
buying_guide_subtitle: A comprehensive guide for new parents to find the perfect fit, comfort, and protection for their baby's sensitive skin.
buying_guide_type_disposables_desc: Ultimate convenience and high absorption for everyday use.
buying_guide_type_cloth_desc: Sustainable choices for sensitive skin and reduced waste.
buying_guide_type_pants_desc: Perfect for active crawlers and toilet training stages.
buying_guide_type_overnight_desc: Maximum capacity for up to 12 hours of dry sleep.
buying_guide_features_subtitle: Don't just buy on price. Ensure these essential features are present to keep your baby's skin healthy and dry.
buying_guide_feature_absorption_desc: Core technology that pulls moisture away from skin instantly to prevent diaper rash.
buying_guide_feature_breathable_desc: Micro-pores that allow air to circulate while keeping liquids locked inside.
buying_guide_feature_indicator_desc: A color-changing strip that tells you exactly when it's time for a fresh change.
buying_guide_size_subtitle: Diaper sizes are based on weight, not age. Use our chart below as a starting point. If you see red marks around the legs or frequent leaks, it's time to size up!
buying_guide_testimonial_text: "Finding the right fit stopped the leaks overnight!"
buying_guide_cta_title: Ready to find the best price?
buying_guide_cta_subtitle: We track daily prices from top retailers like Amazon, Walmart, and Target to ensure you never overpay for your baby's essentials.
